code: /**  * Returns the shard id this segment belongs to.  */ public ShardId shardId() {     return this.shardId. }

public static ElasticsearchLeafReader getElasticsearchLeafReader(LeafReader reader) {     if (reader instanceof FilterLeafReader) {         if (reader instanceof ElasticsearchLeafReader) {             return (ElasticsearchLeafReader) reader.         } else {             // may be instance of ElasticsearchLeafReader. This can cause us to miss the shardId.             return getElasticsearchLeafReader(((FilterLeafReader) reader).getDelegate()).         }     }     return null. }
